## [DORA 2019 Report](https://martinliu.cn/blog/2019-state-devops-survey-report/)
 
Quick sheet for Aspect of Software Delivery Performance 

| No. | Kind | Name | GitHub Dev activity | 
| ------------- | ------------- | ------------- | ------------- | 
|   T1  |  THROUGHPUT |  Deployment frequency  |  Delivery a new release from the trunk |
|   T2  |  THROUGHPUT |   Change lead time  |  Age of a pr, from open to close |
|   S1  |  STABILITY |  Time to restore service|  Age of a issue, a issue might have 1+ pr |
|   S2  |  STABILITY |  Change failure rate  |  A burst of new issue for a release |

There are 4 levels.

| No. | Elite | High | Medium | Low |
| ------------- | ------------- | ------------- | ------------- | ------------- |
| T1 |  1+ per day  |  1+ per week  |  1+ per month  | 1 per6 month  |
| T2  |  >1 day  |  >1 week  |  >1 month  | 1~6 month  |
| S1  |  >1 hours  |  >1 day  |  >1 day  | 1~5 weeks  |
| S2  |  0~15%  |  0~15%  |  0~15%  | 46~60%
